titleStmt.title: A soveraign remedy against atheism and heresy. Fitted for the vvit and vvant of the British nations / by M. Thomas Anderton.
titleStmt.author: Anderton, Thomas.
Hamilton, Frances, Lady.

notesStmt.note: "Published after his death and dedicated to the Lady Frances Hamilton by her humble Chaplin E. G."
Reproduction of original in: Cambridge University Library.
